channel.title: BrewJersey Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Recorded somewhere on the Lanape Trail between Verona and Cedar Grove, your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss, debate and sample New Jersey microbrews.
channel.itunes:author: Dave Fletcher, Michael Auteri
channel.itunes:summary: Recorded somewhere on the Lanape Trail between Verona and Cedar Grove, your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss New Jersey microbrews.
channel.description: Recorded somewhere on the Lanape Trail between Verona and Cedar Grove, your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss New Jersey microbrewery, Carton Brewery and their fantastic Rum-Barrel-Aged Porter, Stormy.

item.title: Brew Jersey Cast: Episode 1 (The Eye of the Stormy)
item.itunes:author: Dave Fletcher, Michael Auteri
item.itunes:subtitle: Your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss the New Jersey microbrewery, Carton Brewery - and their fantastic Rum-Barrel-Aged Porter, Stormy.
item.description: Your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss the New Jersey microbrewery, Carton Brewery - and their fantastic Rum-Barrel-Aged Porter, Stormy.
item.itunes:summary: Your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss the New Jersey microbrewery, Carton Brewery - and their fantastic Rum-Barrel-Aged Porter, Stormy.

item.title: Brew Jersey Cast: Episode 2 (KBS Madness in Essex)
item.itunes:author: Dave Fletcher, Michael Auteri
item.itunes:subtitle: The fellas discuss the recent statewide frenzy over Founders KBS, NYC's Beer Authority, Rattle-n-Hum, and their first beer ever.
item.description: Your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss the recent statewide frenzy over Founders KBS, NYC's Beer Authority, Rattle-n-Hum, and their first beer ever.
item.itunes:summary: Your intrepid beermeisters, Michael Auteri and Dave Fletcher discuss the recent statewide frenzy over Founders KBS, NYC's Beer Authority, Rattle-n-Hum, and their first beer ever.

item.title: Brew Jersey Cast: Episode 3 (Homes Brewery + Ramstein Interview)
item.itunes:author: Dave Fletcher, Michael Auteri
item.itunes:subtitle: Mike and Dave experience a growler of "Same Same Different" from Homes Brewery in Ann Arbor, MI.
item.description: Mike and Dave try a growler of "Same Same Different" from Homes Brewery in Ann Arbor, MI. http://www.homesbrewery.com/ and then bring it back home with an exclusive interview with Greg Zaccardi, Founder of High Point Brewing in Butler, New Jersey http://ramsteinbeer.com/ from Oktoberfest in Montclair, NJ in Oct 2016.
item.itunes:summary: Mike and Dave try a growler of "Same Same Different" from Homes Brewery in Ann Arbor, MI. http://www.homesbrewery.com/ and then bring it back home with an exclusive interview with Greg Zaccardi, Founder of High Point Brewing in Butler, New Jersey http://ramsteinbeer.com/ from Oktoberfest in Montclair, NJ in Oct 2016.

item.title: Brew Jersey Cast: Episode 4 (Magnified Growlers)
item.itunes:author: Dave Fletcher, Michael Auteri
item.itunes:subtitle: For Mike's birthday, the lads try a growler of "Vine Shine IPA" from Magnify Brewing Company in Fairfield, NJ (http://magnifybrewing.com), Gary's and Bottle King in Wayne, discuss bringing your kids to a brewery, and wrap it up with the British translation of Growler and Fanny. Fun for nearly the whole family in this episode. Don't forget to wish Mike a Happy Birthday in the comments.
item.description: For Mike's birthday, the lads try a growler of "Vine Shine IPA" from Magnify Brewing Company in Fairfield, NJ (http://magnifybrewing.com), Gary's and Bottle King in Wayne, discuss bringing your kids to a brewery, and wrap it up with the British translation of Growler and Fanny. Fun for nearly the whole family in this episode. Don't forget to wish Mike a Happy Birthday in the comments.
item.itunes:summary: On Mike's birthday, the lads try a growler of "Vine Shine IPA" from Magnify Brewing Company in Fairfield, NJ.
item.itunes:keywords: beer,microbrewery,new jersey,brewing,magnify brewing company,bottle king, garys

item.title: Brew Jersey Cast: Episode 5 (Boonton Rock & Brew)
item.itunes:author: Dave Fletcher, Michael Auteri
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 5 - Mike and Dave discuss Dave's solo flight at the Boonton Rock & Brew beer festival. While there, Dave runs into Rick Reed, Founder of Cricket Hill, as well as Charlie from Cypress Brewing Company and Bill from Pinelands Brewing. Hijinks ensue.
item.description: Episode 5 - Mike and Dave discuss Dave's solo flight at the Boonton Rock & Brew beer festival. While there, Dave runs into Rick Reed, Founder of Cricket Hill, as well as Charlie from Cypress Brewing Company and Bill from Pinelands Brewing. Hijinks ensue.
item.itunes:summary: Dave's solo flight at the Boonton Rock & Brew beer festival.
